_header: The man that lust to liven in ease
Title(s): ‘Who says þe sooth he shall be shent’
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Addit. 22283 [Simeon]: not in this MS.
_description: ‘Who says þe sooth he shall be shent’ — eight l2-line stanzas, with refrain, ‘he schal be schent’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE Mon þat luste to liuen in eseOr eny worschupe her to
                    ateyne…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…þis lesson lerneþ alle at meho seiþ þe
                    soþe he schal be schent

CamTCC1450.First Lines:
Who so wyll leue yn eseand hys worschypp woll not a
                    layne…
CamTCC1450.Note:
Note added by later hand at heading, after explicit to previous text
                        (2453).
